column4: ubuntu/xubuntu/lubuntu the difference is symantic. if you are claiming this is the wrong room for disscusion
There are dedicated channels of reach of those.
Because Xub* and Lb* come with different packages and slight variations. The channels for the derivatives are so that people especially knowledgable in that field may provide support.
If you are using "Ubuntu" with no prefix nor suffix, this is the place. Else, ask us to lead you where to go.
